title: Requiring the Temporary President of the Senate to appoint a two person committee to inform the Assembly the Senate is ready to proceed with business
fulltext:
SENATE  RESOLUTION  resolved  that  the  Temporary  President  appoint a
Committee of two to wait upon the Assembly and inform that body  of  the
election  of Dean G. Skelos as Temporary President of the Senate for the
years 2011-2012, and that the Senate is organized and ready  to  proceed
with business

RESOLVED,  That  the  Temporary  President  appoint  a  Committee of two
comprised of Senator Mark Grisanti and Senator Gustavo  Rivera  for  the
purpose  of  waiting  upon  the  Assembly and informing that body of the
election of Dean G. Skelos as Temporary President of the Senate for  the
years  2011-2012,  and that the Senate is organized and ready to proceed
with business.
